title: Research rich file operations for line-based editing
description:
Research and design line-based file editing capabilities inspired by cursor-agent.

Current state:
- Consoul uses basic file operations through bash_execute tool
- No native file manipulation tools in the SDK

Proposed features from cursor-agent:
- Line-based editing with JSON format: {"1-5": "new content", "10-12": "more content"}
- Complete file replacement option
- Read file with line range control
- Better validation and error handling

Research tasks:
1. Review cursor-agent's file_tools.py implementation
2. Analyze how line-based editing improves AI coding workflows
3. Design API that integrates with Consoul's tool system
4. Consider security implications and permission requirements
5. Evaluate if this should be SDK tools or TUI-specific features
6. Plan integration with existing bash_execute tool

Success criteria:
- Document technical approach
- Create API design proposal
- Identify security considerations
- Estimate implementation effort

References:
- cursor-agent file_tools.py
- Consoul tool system: src/consoul/ai/tools/
